data.name: Classroom of the Elite: Man is condemned to be free.
data.short_description: As part of a special test, the school has brought the students to an uninhabited tropical island where they must now live for a week. Their performance on the test can have an enormous impact on the point standings of the four classes.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Classroom of the Elite: Man is condemned to be free.
